mapper.insert: insert into education_application_detail ( member_id, program_no, stts_no ) values ( #{memberId}, #{programNo}, 1 )
mapper.select: select mem.member_id, member_name, birthdate, tel, aff_center from member mem inner join ( select member_id from education_application_detail where program_no = #{programNo} and stts_no != 2 ) eduapp on mem.member_id = eduapp.member_id
